title: The Broken Spindle
description: The Merchant's supply line leads to a massive, corrupted Loom hidden in the abandoned subway tunnels. You must destroy the machine producing the mind-control silk.

turns.narrative: The Loom is operated by horrifying Spider-Thralls—half human, half arachnid. They spit sticky webbing.
turns.choice_a: Use a specialized solvent to dissolve the webs instantly
turns.consequence_a: You remain mobile, easily outmaneuvering and killing the thralls.
turns.choice_b: Hack your way through the webs with brute force
turns.consequence_b: You get bogged down. The thralls bite you repeatedly, causing moderate poison damage.

turns.narrative: The Loom is powered by a massive, spinning spindle of arcane energy. The Overseer, a colossal arachnid, defends it.
turns.choice_a: Throw the Overseer into the spinning spindle
turns.consequence_a: The beast is shredded by the arcane energy, simultaneously clogging and destroying the Loom.
turns.choice_b: Plant explosives on the spindle while dodging the Overseer
turns.consequence_b: You blow the Loom up, but have to fight the enraged Overseer in the burning ruins.

spindle_clogged.description: You used the Overseer's body to destroy the Loom.

spindle_exploded.description: You blew up the Loom and defeated the Overseer.

conclusion: You used the Overseer's body to destroy the Loom.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
